overlays.name: labels
overlays.descr: Hippocampal atlas + whole brain regions of Dorr et al. 2008

config.templateName: Hippocampal atlas by Badhwar, Lerch, Hamel, Sled 2013
config.slicePositionDescription: posterior(-) or anterior(+) distance to origin
aboutHtml: Anatomical images (T2-weighted 3D fast spin-echo) of adult C57Bl/6J mouse brains were acquired on a 7.0 Tesla scanner at an isotropic resolution of 32 μm. The hippocampus proper was manually segmented into the CA1, CA2, and CA3 subfields using the average volume generated from 103 independent mouse brain images. A detailed description of this atlas can be found in Badhwar et al., 2013. The non-hippocampal areas are obtained from the whole brain atlas of Dorr et al., 2008, using an automated registration procedure.

definingCitations.title: Impaired structural correlates of memory in Alzheimer's disease mice
